channel.title: Help with mage w/ Runes
channel.description: Im trying to add runes a while now, but i always get the 100 errors shit. Add a new } After it and still 100 errors. Look how many {'s are open and i closed all. After all where need is an ; Can someone post me a basic Wind strike w/ Runes? I edit the other to it then..

item.title: Help with mage w/ Runes
item.dc:creator: @Fir3_Flam3 Fir3 Flam3
item.description:
@Fir3_Flam3 wrote:

Try this:

[center]This tutorial was requested:[/center]

Purpose: playerHasItemAmount.

Difficulty: Easy.

Assumed Knowledge: Copy and Paste.

Server Base: PimpScape - I used a default PimpScape.

Classes Modified: Client.Java

Procedure

Step 1:
Open your Client.Java.

Step 2:
Search for:

public boolean playerHasItemAmount(int itemID, int itemAmount) { //if(itemID == 0 || itemAmount == 0) return true; playerItemAmountCount = 0; for (int i=0; i<playerItems.length; i++) { if (playerItems[i] == itemID+1) { playerItemAmountCount = playerItemsN[i]; } if(playerItemAmountCount >= itemAmount){ return true;} } //return (itemAmount <= playerItemAmountCount); return true; }

Step 3:
Replace with mines:

public boolean playerHasItemAmount(int itemID, int itemAmount) { //if(itemID == 0 || itemAmount == 0) return true; playerItemAmountCount = 0; for (int i=0; i<playerItems.length; i++) { if (playerItems[i] == itemID+1) { playerItemAmountCount = playerItemsN[i]; } if(playerItemAmountCount >= itemAmount){ return true;} } //return (itemAmount <= playerItemAmountCount); return false; }

Credits to: Azn Ix, not me.

Read full topic
